field.name: externalId
field.description: This field stores product category ID of the external system

field.name: parentProductCategoryId
field.description: The parent category; it should be one of productCategoryId already setup in ProductCategory or ProductCategoryRollup

field.name: defaultDaysToShip
field.description: In the absence of a product specific days to ship in ProductFacility, this will be used

field.name: defaultDimensionUomId
field.description: This field store the unit of measurement of dimension (length, width and height)

field.name: externalId
field.description: This field stores facility ID of the external system

relationship.description: this was changed from the FK to better handle syncronization; this may be set back to be a FK in the future

field.name: lastInventoryCount
field.description: This field represents availableToPromiseTotal of a product at a certain point of time and is being updated regularly by a schedule service every hour

field.name: ownerPartyId
field.description: The owner of the inventory item.

field.name: unitCost
field.description: Higher precision in case it is a calculated number

field.name: currencyUomId
field.description: The currency Uom of the unit cost.

field.name: ownerPartyId
field.description: Used to track a changed (new) ownerPartyId as a status changes.

field.name: productId
field.description: Used to track a changed (new) productId as a status changes. In other words over time the item may be represented by a different Product (like new versus refurbished).

field.name: termUomId
field.description: Mainly used for recurring and usage prices to specify a time/freq measure, or a usage unit measure (bits, minutes, etc)

field.name: customPriceCalcService
field.description: Points to a CustomMethod used to specify a service for the calculation of the unit price of the product (NOTE: a better name for this field might be priceCalcCustomMethodId)

field.name: priceWithoutTax
field.description: Always without tax if populated, regardless of if price does or does not include tax.

field.name: priceWithTax
field.description: Always with tax if populated, regardless of if price does or does not include tax.

field.name: taxInPrice
field.description: If Y the price field has tax included for the given taxAuthPartyId/taxAuthGeoId at the taxPercentage.

field.name: primaryProductCategoryId
field.description: The primary category ; it should be one of the productCategoryId already setup in ProductCategoryMember

field.name: quantityIncluded
field.description: If you have a six-pack of 12oz soda cans you would have quantityIncluded=12, quantityUomId=oz, piecesIncluded=6.

field.name: fixedAmount
field.description: Use this for products which are sold in fixed denominations, such as gift certificates or calling cards.

field.name: shippingWeight
field.description: The shipping weight of the product.

field.name: virtualVariantMethodEnum
field.description: This field defines the method of selecting a variant from the selectable features on the virtual product. Either as a variant explosion which will work to about 200 variants or as feature explosion which almost has no limits

field.name: reservMaxPersons
field.description: maximum number of persons who can rent this asset at the same time

field.name: reserv2ndPPPerc
field.description: percentage of the end price for the 2nd person renting this asset connected to this product

field.name: reservNthPPPerc
field.description: percentage of the end price for the Nth person renting this asset connected to this product

field.name: configId
field.description: Used to safe the persisted configuration Id for AGGREGATED products.

field.name: lotIdFilledIn
field.description: Indicate if the lotId must be informed

field.name: orderDecimalQuantity
field.description: use to indicate if decimal quantity can be ordered for this product. Default value is Y

field.name: payToPartyId
field.description: Note that this corresponds with the organizationPartyId that GL transactions will be posted to.

field.name: isImmediatelyFulfilled
field.description: If immediately fulfilled (for physical stores, etc): don't send email notices, don't reserve inventory, and IFF inventory info isn't found on the server then don't issue inventory right away

field.name: balanceResOnOrderCreation
field.description: If set to Y, when a new sales order is created with backordered items, then reservations on the facility/product are reassigned according to the priority given by the shipBeforeDate field.

field.name: storeCreditAccountEnumId
field.description: Specify the type (Billing Account or Financial Account) of Store Credit Account used for refund return. Default to Financial Account. This field is override by ReturnHeader.billingAccountId or ReturnHeader.finAccountId, whichever is specified but if only finAccountId is specified explicitly then system will first try to locate any billing account with -ve amount. If found, then amount is credit to this billing account else the amount will be credit to the financial account of the user.

field.name: autoInvoiceDigitalItems
field.description: Default Y. Invoice digital items when order is placed rather than waiting for completing order items (though shipment/fulfillment).

field.name: reqShipAddrForDigItems
field.description: Default Y. Require Shipping Address for Digital Items? Note this only has an effect if there are ONLY digital goods in the cart.

field.name: showTaxIsExempt
field.description: default Y; if set to N do not show isExempt checkbox for PartyTaxAuthInfo, always force to N

field.name: enableAutoSuggestionList
field.description: The auto-suggestion list is a special ShoppingList that the addSuggestionsToShoppingList service will maintain for cross-sells of ordered items.

field.name: prodSearchExcludeVariants
field.description: default Y; if set to Y an additional constraint will of isVariant!=Y will be added to all product searches for the store

field.name: autoOrderCcTryExp
field.description: For auto-orders try other Credit Card expiration dates (if date is wrong or general failure where type not known)?

field.name: autoOrderCcTryOtherCards
field.description: For auto-orders try other Credit Cards for the customer?

field.name: autoOrderCcTryLaterNsf
field.description: For auto-orders if Credit Cards fails for NSF (Not Sufficient Funds) try again later?

field.name: autoOrderCcTryLaterMax
field.description: For auto-orders if Credit Cards fails for NSF try again how many times?

field.name: storeCreditValidDays
field.description: How many days that store credit is valid for. Null value implies no expiration.

field.name: autoApproveInvoice
field.description: If Y or empty, sales invoices created from orders will be marked ready.

field.name: autoApproveOrder
field.description: If N, orders will not be automatically approved when payment is authorized.

field.name: shipIfCaptureFails
field.description: If N, the captureOrderPayments will cause a service error if credit card capture fails.

field.name: setOwnerUponIssuance
field.description: If Y or empty, set the inventory item owner upon issuance.

field.name: reqReturnInventoryReceive
field.description: Default N. This is the default value for the ReturnHeader.needsInventoryReceive field. If set to Y return will automatically go to the Received status when Accepted instead of waiting for actual receipt of the return.

field.name: addToCartRemoveIncompat
field.description: Default N. If Y then on add to cart remove all products in cart with a ProductAssoc record related to or from the product and with the PRODUCT_INCOMPATABLE type.

field.name: addToCartReplaceUpsell
field.description: Default N. If Y then on add to cart remove all products in cart with a ProductAssoc record related from the product and with the PRODUCT_UPGRADE type.

field.name: splitPayPrefPerShpGrp
field.description: Default N. If Y then before the order is stored the OrderPaymentPreference record will be split, one for each OrderItemShipGroup.

field.name: managedByLot
field.description: If Y, the preparator can choose the InventoryItem by this lotId when he makes the picklist.

field.name: showOutOfStockProducts
field.description: Default Y. If N then out of stock products will not be displayed on site

field.name: orderDecimalQuantity
field.description: use to indicate if decimal quantity can be ordered for this producStore. Default value is Y

field.name: allowComment
field.description: Allow comments for order line items per store

field.name: bodyScreenLocation
field.description: if empty defaults to a screen based on the emailType

field.name: xslfoAttachScreenLocation
field.description: if specified is used to generate XSL:FO that is transformed to a PDF via Apache FOP and attached to the email

field.name: allowProductStoreChange
field.description: Allow change of ProductStore for this WebSite (webapp). Defaults to N (no).

field.name: hostedPathAlias
field.description: For WebSites hosted on webapp using the WebSiteFilter, indicates the path this WebSite will be hosted on

field.name: isDefault
field.description: If Y then it is default WebSite

field.name: displayMaintenancePage
field.description: If set to Y, redirect user to site maintenance page
